term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - reduced viscosity of a polymer
term.title: reduced viscosity

item.text: The ratio of the relative viscosity increment to the mass concentration of the polymer, c, i.e. η i c, where η i is the relative viscosity increment.

notes.item: The unit must be specified; cm3 g-1 is recommended.

This quantity is neither a viscosity nor a pure number. The term is to be looked on as a traditional name. Any replacement by consistent terminology would produce unnecessary confusion in the polymer literature. Synonymous with viscosity number.
